alert.note: Alert for Greer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greer County through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mangum, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mangum, Granite and northwestern Altus-Lugert Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
